name: MINOTAUR (itch) (BRAINOS)
description:
Enter the labyrinth and test your courage and wit. Will you survive to the exit, or will you perish at the mighty axe of the MINOTAUR?

/
WASD / Arrow Keys / D-pad / Analog stick will all move the character.
Enter / Start will both start the game.
Escape will reset to the title, and if already at the title, will then exit.
/

This is a short game made in 24-ish hours after some heavy personal stuff came up and I just needed a break from everything. I had a lot of fun making this, and hopefully you can wring a few minutes of fun out of this, too. At the end of the day, it's literally just a maze game. Or maybe a pac-man clone if pac-man wasn't eating and the ghosts were all on steroids and merged into a single, terrifying demon. 

The music is thanks to Patrick de Arteaga, under Creative Commons license. Link: 
patrickdearteaga.com

The songs used are "Beware The Monster," for tension and "Death At My Heels," during chases.
